metadata.name: Pivotal Pins #1
metadata.description: Something is going on at the bowling alley... Bowling pins have fused with sneaker colorways in the metaverse and developed unique characteristics and their own personalities. Pivotal Pins is an ERC-721 token featuring 10 000 unique programmatically generated bowling pins, including 200+ unique hand-drawn traits and 100+ Pin bases inspired primarily by SB Dunk colorways. The roadmap includes 50 ETH in Sneaker Giveaways to holders.
